Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn 16th July, 2012 PQLCY MATTERS-Administration/Finance (84/2012) (Decision taken on FileNoNHAILI 1033/MFHIOL20121 Subject: -Invocation of Bank Guarantee- Further to the guidelines contained in Policy Circulars 79/2004 dated 15.3.2004 and 12/2007 dated 28.06.2007 , following instructions are issued in the matter of maintenance and invocation of BG's for compliance: i) In the matter of invocation of BG, the decision to invoke any Bank Guarantee is hereby delegated to the concerned Member (or in his absence to the link member): it) The invocation letter will be signed by an officer of the Authority, not below the rank of General Manager. Since PIU's are temporary offices and are likely to shift to another location after execution of specified projects, the BG's now being held by PIU's will henceforth be held by the concerned RO's. 2 This issues with the approval of Chairman: (V.K Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord /LA) To, AlLotficers and employees of HQIZO[ROSIPIUs[CMUs[Site Qlfices NHAL
